messages.message:
Hey Shaunak - Totally understand this update.
• Can we get a schedule of what hours this will occur on?  I.e. at midnight, 4am, 8am etc?
• Can we ensure there is a system to override this?  I.e. critical customer work or workshops which will run across those threshold times?  With manager approval, we keep the sandbox on for X many cycles?
Yes @Dan H this is for epd sandboxes.  We'll have the customer sandboxes in the do not hibernate list :blush:
What does force turndown mean? Does it check if sandbox is being used, if not turn down?
No, we’ll just hibernate the sandbox even if it is being used.  You’ll have to revive it back to reuse it.
